choices: To go and have a snack of some cars and buildings
A nice bit of barefoot crushing
Make a more interesting video for Busy
1.content:
"Ahh, this is good!" Olly sighed. He was led on a sofa in his dressing room eating chicken. He was on a break from shooting the video to his latest single Busy. "I don't know what they put in this chicken but it's f***ing great!" he said, licking his lips. He devoured it all in minutes, then one of the runners came to get him - the break was over. "Olly, we need you on set in 2 minutes!" she said.
"That's Mr Murs to you..." he snorted obnoxiously. The runner raised her eyebrows and walked out. Olly slipped his sandals off (the next scene was barefoot) and popped the thick black glasses on that were required for the shoot. "I'm one sexy geek..." he beamed. As he walked, he felt his jeans getting tighter, but thought nothing of it. In his eyes, the tighter the jeans the sexier he was. But when he walked on set, he didn't know why everyone was gasping. Then he looked down, his jeans had ripped and he wearing just boxers. Taking the glasses off, he looked up and the ceiling was getting closer. "I'm growing!" Olly said, laughing with satisfaction. It was seconds later and he smashed through the roof. When he eventually stopped, he must've been 200ft tall. Strangely his tshirt hadn't ripped - nor had his boxers. "HA HA HA I'M HUGE!" he boomed. His first action as the world's hugest man was...
1.title: Big bad Olly

info.brief_description: Sexy Olly Murs grows to 200ft tall and terrorises London!
info.description:
Olly Murs is a big star, but nobody ever dreamed he'd end up literally a huge star! While riding high on the singles chart, Olly is desperate to be able to avoid all the pesky fans, and a strange old man gives him a potion which is meant to be a solution - but it makes him grow to titanic size, which just draws pretty every news channel in the world to him! Furious Olly takes his anger out on the world by filling his now huge belly with plenty of snacks and crushing everything in sight under his huge feet... It seems that the colossus is unstoppable...

Olly:http://xfactor-updates.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/09/Olly-Murs.jpg

http://www.unrealitytv.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2011/02/olly-murs-trek.jpg
http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3507/xfactorollymurs02jpg.jpg -
http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/928/fullwenn2631609preview.jpg

Please feel free to add, but please make sure Olly is the only giant please! He can interact with men/woman, aside from him being the only giant there really isn't any limitation :D

So I hope you like the story! :)
